app.name: Oh My Pi
app.one_liner: AI Coding agent for the terminal with hash-anchored edits, optimized tool harness, LSP, Python, browser, subagents, and more.

screens.name: Main Terminal Interface
screens.purpose: Primary interaction surface for conversing with the AI agent, issuing commands, viewing streaming output, and managing sessions.

screens.name: Settings Configuration
screens.purpose: Configure API keys, models, providers, themes, custom system prompts, and agent modules.

rust_commands.name: save_item
rust_commands.purpose: Persistently store an item such as a session, configuration, or generated artifact.

rust_commands.name: list_items
rust_commands.purpose: Retrieve a list of stored items like sessions or configurations.

rust_commands.name: execute_tool_call
rust_commands.purpose: Invoke a registered tool (e.g., git-overview, file I/O, shell) based on agent request.
